entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM MDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, 22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 2:24 PM MDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Haze
Temperature: 22.6°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 18 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 72
